forest.title: Forest
choices: All the trees.
Beware the bears.
Call your wild.
Just out of reach.

mountains.title: Mountains
choices: Dwarven spirits soar!
Even stone crumbles.
Fly or fall?
Kinship above all.

swamp.title: Swamp
choices: Gators be everywhere.
Hide now to thrive later.
Ill spirits cling to ye.
Lost in the fog.

ocean.title: Ocean
choices: Many waves til tomorrow.
Night shall pass before you pass.
Open skies spill onto the shore.
Parry the blade but not the brine.
